Nova Music A music player written in the libcosmic toolkit
https://github.com/lunarsrl/NovaMusic
FSFAP GPL-2.0-or-later
` Samuel Rivero luna
pointing keyboard
A music player written in the libcosmic toolkit. Scans a directory for audio files, loads metadata, and displays and organizes it across a number of pages. View your music by individual tracks, albums, or artists. Create m3u8 playlists easily from within the application, choose a name and icon and see it displayed on the playlists page for easy access to your favorite songs.
